name: Word Chase
description:
Word Chase

Made for the VimJam 8 Bits to Infinity Game Jam.

Collect letters, spell words, complete levels.  You must navigate mazes and solve word puzzles.

Use the arrow keys (or WASD) to move.

Press SPACE to DASH, which will get you places fast.

Something odd lurks between levels.

Designed using Unity development platform, BeepBox for sound effects, and GIMP/Inkscape for art.
